attributes.action: No Extensions to the Brexit Transition Period
attributes.additional_details: Extending the transition period would be a serious betrayal of the trust that voters put in the government.
attributes.background: Covid-19 is NOT a valid excuse to extend the transition period with the EU past 31st December.  There is no reason why negotiations cant take place via 21st century methods online which even the EU itself are already starting to do.
